Package gameboard.objects

Class Harvester

java.lang.Object
gameboard.objects.MovingObject
gameboard.objects.Machine
gameboard.objects.Harvester
public class Harvester
extends Machine
This class represents the harvester with its properties to harvest a field.
Author:
Luisaibele

    private int GRAIN_TANK_CAPACITY
